Sirius XM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Dr. Ben Carson will call in LIVE to the program to speak about where he will lead America if elected in 2016.

On the November 3 Breitbart News Daily show on Sirius XM Patriot channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM EST, host and Breitbart News Executive Chairman Stephen K. Bannon will host and interview a number of guests.
Bannon will interview Breitbart contributor and Hollywood actor Robert Davi about the boycott of anti-cop activist director Quentin Tarantino’s upcoming movie, The Hateful Eight.
Breitbart London’s Raheem Kassam will call into the program LIVE from London, England to discuss German Chancellor Angela Merkel’s pro-Muslim invasion policy in Germany.
Erik Prince, founder of the famed private military contractor Blackwater, will give a LIVE update from Beijing and discuss the ongoing conflicts in the Middle East.
Presidential candidate Donald Trump’s campaign manager Corey Lewandowski will call into the program to discuss the state of the debate negotiations.
Bannon will interview Breitbart News’ Dr. Thomas Williams will talk LIVE from Rome, Italy to discuss China’s one child policy.
Former Virginia Congressman Virgil Goode will call into the show to talk about his endorsement of Trump for president.
Breitbart News’ Alex Swoyer will call into the program and report on the state of the presidential campaigns in Iowa.
The show will lead with an interview with Republican presidential candidate Dr. Ben Carson.
The program is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
